title: Zed Perma Shadow (GAMEPLAY)
body: I had a bug with zed in my previous game allowing me to have a permanent shadow. I was playing with the skin SKT T1 Zed. I was in top lane and I R'd Sion, after this I seemed to disappear then I was killed by Sion. After this my shadow never left and when I went top again I was still able to cast spells and deal damage through the shadow, however i could not teleport to it.

replies.body: Interesting. I though that case was fixed. I'll look into it on Tuesday!

Are you guys also aware that patch 5.17 has changed Zed's W shadow creation sound to the sound he makes when he jumps to a shadow? And that his shadow creation sound is completely missing? It's not even swapped to where the jump sound used to be.

Here is my thread in the Bug Report forum:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/PsjyzElZ-video-a-few-minor-aesthetic-bugs-with-project-zed

And here is the video:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ug2QT5E15cU

(Do note that in the video, the noises are swapped, but on Live, Zed's shadow creation sound is completely missing, and the sound he makes when he creates his W shadow is switched to the sound he makes when he jumps to a shadow)

(Also, this video shows a bug that removed his wind-down animation after doing an emote, but this is currently fixed on Live)

It's been a few days since I've made these threads now...and I really like the "haaa" sound that Zed makes when he creates his W shadow. I really want to know what happened to it. Is this a bug? Is this intended?
Yes, my boss has forwarded me your thread. It's being investigated into.
tuesday..? No hot fix or disable to stop bug abusers ? :(
